headline.main: ITALY IS UNDECIDED ON U.S. PRISONERS; Cases of Correspondents and Observers Caught in Libya Are Studied Individually

lead_paragraph: ROME, Nov. 27 -- The disposition of the two military observers and the American war correspondents captured by the Italian forces in Libya was being studied here today.
abstract: Itals undecided on disposition of U S prisoners captured in Libya
